description: Man Utd transfer rumours: Rashford, Mainoo, Garnacho, Suzuki
title: Man Utd transfer rumours: Rashford, Mainoo, Garnacho, Suzuki
title_page: Man Utd transfer rumours: Rashford, Mainoo, Garnacho, Suzuki - BBC Sport
maintext:
Manchester United's rivals are waiting to pounce on January deals for midfielder Kobbie Mainoo and forwards Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho as they anticipate co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe wanting to avoid last-minute profit and sustainability rules sales on 30 June to stay within financial rules. (Telegraph, external)
If he leaves Old Trafford, Rashford would prefer a move to Barcelona ahead of other options this month. (Sport - in Spanish, external)
Meanwhile, United are among the clubs considering Â£40m-rated Japan and Parma goalkeeper Zion Suzuki, 22. (Talksport, external)
